org.cougaar.core.wp.resolver
Interface SelectService

All Superinterfaces:
Service
public interface SelectService
extends Service

This service is the "server selection service" advertised by the SelectManager that the ClientTransport uses to select a white pages server.

The primary job of this service is to locate servers and select the best one. The update(org.cougaar.core.mts.MessageAddress, long, boolean) feedback can be used to aid selection.

Method Detail

select

MessageAddress select(boolean lookup,
                      java.lang.String name)
Select a server for the specified name.

For example, this could be a lookup for the record of "AgentX". A server from the pool is selected and returned, or null is returned if no applicable server is listed.

update

void update(MessageAddress addr,
            long duration,
            boolean timeout)
Update the server list with measured performance statistics.

If the timeout flag is false then the duration is the measured round-trip-time for the message response, otherwise the duration is the timeout duration.

contains

boolean contains(MessageAddress addr)
Returns:
true if the address is a listed white pages server
